bem_reader.py¶

class HydroDB.bem_reader.NemohReader(cal_file=None, test=True, nb_face_by_wave_length=None)[source]¶

Bases: HydroDB.bem_reader._BEMReader

Class NemohReader, derived from _BEMReader, for reading the Nemoh calculation files (*.cal).

set_calculation_file(cal_file, test=True)[source]¶

Reads the *.cal file parameters and loads the hdb and the Kochin numerical results.

Parameters:
  • cal_file (string) – Path to the *.cal file.
  • test (bool, optional) – If true (default), tests the consistency between frequency range and the mesh discretization.
Returns:

hydro_db – The hydrodynamic database.
Return type:

HydroDB
